text: Blonay – Saint-Légier is a municipality in Riviera-Pays-d'Enhaut in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. It was created on 1 January 2022 from the former municipalities of Blonay and Saint-Légier-La Chiésaz. Category:2022 establishments in Switzerland Category:Municipalities in Riviera-Pays-d'Enhaut
title: Blonay – Saint-Légier
